value:
I can't understand what she's talking
about... "Friends"?$k$pOh... I was talking to myself.

The tribespeople were so kind.
What those dogs from Bern did...

Stop wandering around. Get some
rest.

My blade has one purpose: revenge.
Keep your distance.

I've killed so many of them. Why
doesn't my burden get lighter?
What is the point of revenge?

You're $Nu, right?
Got a message for you. Here.

Name's Rutger. You summoned me
here. What for?

Revenge was my purpose. I fought.
I had to. But I didn't take pride in it.$k$pThe people you've gathered here...
These "Heroes"... They're nothing like
me.$k$pI never had an ally—or followed
orders. And visiting other realms...
All of this is new to me.$k$pFather Sky and Mother Earth are
distant... Until I know my path, I'll
stay with you.$k$pI don't need revenge anymore. I
can slay your foes. Where to?
I'm Rutger, a swordsman from Sacae.
...You're too close. Step back if you want to live.
When my people were murdered, I learned the gravest lesson of all. The weak die. There are no exceptions.
Each swordsman cuts his own path. Mine is stained with the blood of my foes. You cannot learn anything by following this trail of blood.
I will only spar with those as skilled as him. No exceptions.
For me...there is no other way to live.
I won't accept your charity. However, if you will fight by my side, I will welcome your presence on the battlefield.
